00023 void PhysListView::dropEvent( QDropEvent* event ) {
00024         // make sure the source is not this view
00025         PortListView* source = qobject_cast<PortListView*>(event->source());
00026         PortMapsView* mapSource = qobject_cast<PortMapsView*>(event->source());
00027 
00028         // if source is neither of the supported
00029         if (!source && !mapSource) {
00030                 return;
00031         }
00032 
00033         if (mapSource && event->proposedAction() == Qt::CopyAction) {
00034                 event->acceptProposedAction();
00035                 return;
00036         }
00037 
00038         QModelIndex index = indexAt(event->pos());
00039 
00040         // tell source that nothing is to be done to item
00041         event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
00042 
00043         // if no port name has been specified or drop index is invalid
00044         QString mimeText = event->mimeData()->text();
00045         if (mimeText.isEmpty()) {
00046                 event->accept();
00047                 return;
00048         }
00049 
00050         // get the ports that were selected
00051         QStringList dropped = mimeText.split(QString(";"), QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00052 
00053         // if the item to drop is from this port list view
00054         if (source == this) {
00055                 emit moveItems(dropped, index);
00056                 event->accept();
00057                 return;
00058         }
00059 
00060         // get the selected indexes in this view
00061         QModelIndexList indexes = selectedIndexes();
00062         QStringList physicals;
00063 
00064         // add the physical port that matches each selected index
00065         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00066                 if (index.isValid()) {
00067                         // append each port with valid model index
00068                         physicals.append(index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString());
00069                 }
00070         }
00071 
00072         // inform that connection should be made
00073         emit makeConnection(physicals, dropped);
00074 
00075         // accept the drop
00076         event->accept();
00077 }
